response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment that will significantly enhance your capabilities and productivity. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny of the $12,000. However, to facilitate a smoother transaction, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
